website_summaries.verdict: Extremely low price point for a manual winch that can handle weights up to 1,500 pounds.
pros: Ships with a 20-foot strap, which adds to the good value you'll receive from this winch
Uses a zinc-plated finish that ensures resistance to corrosion
Oil bearings ensure a smooth performance
Will handle heavy-duty jobs with a 1,500-pound limit
cons: Thinner materials in the winch may not give you the kind of longevity you need from this tool

customer_reviews.title: I have it Five stars at first, until the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have it Five stars at first, until the handle stripped out and the gears slipped while loading my boat. Cheap! I will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: We used attached and used this wench on our boat trailer one time, during which the handle on the crank snapped off, injuring my husbands hand and chest!!! We had to strap the boat down with different strap and very carefully drive home from the lake!!! I'm 2 days out of the return window or I would get my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly strong

customer_reviews.title: Broke!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality, this broke the first time we used it. Unfortunately we can not request a refund because our return period closed. This is not a spring loaded gear so you must manually flip it. But the handle and the gear actually busted upon first use, we ended up having to cut the strap to get our boat off.
customer_reviews.author: cortney

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed it should state that these do not have free ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed it should state that these do not have free wheel when trying to pull them out to hook up ski.. but my own fault ya get what you pay for.. I just hope it makes it through season.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Marinelli

customer_reviews.title: Winch failed.... miserable moment at the marina!
customer_reviews.text: The winch wheel slipped off teeth (circled red in photo) and made it impossible to pull the boat back onto the trailer. Had to use a screwdriver to force the wheel back and ultimately push boat back in the water, damaging the motor.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The winch arrived quickly and installation was no problem. 8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! Poor quality. Assembled with parts bent and misaligned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and price.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and needed. Seems to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Radford

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to shim up the gears to get them to fit probably
customer_reviews.author: Stan R.

customer_reviews.title: ... figuring for the price I would not be 100% satisfied. Besides I got 2 of these for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I was figuring for the price I would not be 100% satisfied. Besides I got 2 of these for my jetski trailer. Seeing as I would be using these for jetskis I didn't need the best I could find. Wow was I disappointed beyond my wildest expectations for the price. I think they may last a season. You can't even free wheel them when you're trying to drag out the strap to hook to the boat. 110% junk. Once I save up some money for good ones these will be in the trash. Glad I have safety chains.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more money for a sturdier winch. A good example that you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: bent the first time I used it - pulling a boat that weighed less than 250 pounds. Really useless. Might be good for hauling up a window shade or lifting a three year old.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wilk

product_meta.title: Driver Recovery Manual Hand Crank Trailer Winch with Hook and 20' Strap - Heavy Duty 1,500 Pound Capacity
product_meta.description: This Driver Recovery Products 1,500 pound manual winch is designed with just the right mechanical advantage for smooth, easy loading of your vessel or cargo onto its trailer. Premium-quality features include a corrosion-resistant, zinc-plated finish, high-carbon steel gears, a full-length drum bushing and oil-impregnated shaft bushings, making this winch ideally suited to provide lasting use for ramp launching, long distance towing, hunting, camping, or even just kept stored in your vehicle for emergencies. Get the power and security you need plus added convenience, low-maintenance, and easy-to-install operation with the Driver Recovery Products 1,500 pound hand winch. Includes a 20' strap with hook and comfort grip handle for ease of use. Driver Recovery Products is a leading brand within the hitch rack and trailering market, widely recognized for excellence at providing a wide range of premium-quality accessories that offer exceptional functionality at an affordable price.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY: Every detail of this small but powerful winch has been designed to deliver high performance and rugged resilience, including high-carbon steel gears that meet SAE 1050 specifications to resist wear, full-length drum bushing, and permanently lubricated bearings for minimum maintenance.

1500 POUND CAPACITY: Rated to provide excellent load lifting facility, this easy-to-use manual winch features a 4:1 gear ratio that will pull up to 1,500 pounds and unreels/unloads easily, making it a useful and versatile tool.
CORROSION-RESISTANT: Winch features a zinc-plated finish for superior corrosion resistance.
20' STRAP: Includes a 2" x 20' detachable strap for convenience and easier facilitation of use.
COMFORT-GRIP HANDLE: The upgraded handle of this winch provides a secure grip for comfortable, easy cranking.
